body: This scan is incredible, nice work !
The last page ... is she married, cheating on him? again? or the last 4 pages, represent the start as they started cheating?

i copy this from chinese comment
"The last few sentences were said by Huang Mao. It was probably the person on the opposite side of the phone told him to be careful. Don't always do this kind of thing. Sooner or later, he will be stabbed by a woman. Then he joked that I would tie the iron plate to her belly"

look like last pages is explain how start his shit game and how end he plot with made her pregnant...

@mememon  He didn't redraw it he had it printed by a publisher  you retarded cocksucker .The previous version was  a doujinshi meaning it was a self published work but this is the manga tank which means mangaka had a deal with a publisher and had his doujinshi printed as manga . He only added/drew the extra four pages at the end and the cover  for the manga version otherwise he didn't redraw shit.
So the last 4 pages can anyone translate?
@krista the author redraw it to make it more like his latest art for book printing. and he added extra 4 pages at the end.
This works was enden in 2010. Weird.
